General.Name: MAG Holdings Berhad
General.Description: MAG Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the prawn aquaculture business in Malaysia. The company is also involved in seafood processing, as well as marine shrimp aquaculture business. MAG Holdings Berhad was formerly known as XingHe Holdings Berhad. MAG Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
